# Go-specific patterns for .goneatignore
# Generated by goneat init for Go projects

# Go modules and dependencies
*.mod
*.sum
go.work
go.work.sum

# Build artifacts
dist/
bin/
*.exe
*.test
*.out

# Dependencies
vendor/

# Coverage reports
coverage.out
*.cover
coverage.html

# IDE and editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Log files
*.log

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.bak

# Test fixtures and data
testdata/
fixtures/

# Documentation build artifacts
docs/build/
docs/.doctrees/

# CI/CD artifacts
.github/workflows/*.log
